metadata.title: CVE-2012-2129 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in doku.php in DokuWiki 2012-01-25Angua allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML viathe target parameter in an edit action.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2129` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dokuwiki - 0.0.20140929.d-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dokuwiki package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.0.20140929.d-1ubuntu1').
